choices: You have turned into a female demon
You have turned into a inanimate object
You are conjoined from the neck down with a demon
You have become a body part of one of the many demons of hell
1.content:
One day we’ll you are running through hell you begin to feel woozy.
You then black out.
When you wake up you feel kinda different. then you realize?
1.title: Doom guy gets doomed?

info.brief_description: This is for all my doom eternal lovers out there!
info.description: Your the doom guy. well you are running through one of the levels you black out and something happens to you
